channel.title: Help with this 317 need tutorial please look and respond!
channel.description: okay, this is what i would like you (the reader) to do. Tell me if there is a tutorial on making npc's vs. npc's. I would appreciatte it, i will include you in creditz for finding the tutorial for me. or making the tutorial for me. I would love it. Because i have used [u]google, ask, windows live search, and the search bar[/u]. [b]NOTHING[/b]. please help me! and if you could also find one for a [u]508+[/u] server... would really appreciate it. Trying to make some team pvp stuff and on the teams they have npcs who fight each other. =] would love it!

item.title: Help with this 317 need tutorial please look and respond!
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

okay, this is what i would like you (the reader) to do. Tell me if there is a tutorial on making npc’s vs. npc’s. I would appreciatte it, i will include you in creditz for finding the tutorial for me. or making the tutorial for me. I would love it. Because i have used google, ask, windows live search, and the search bar. NOTHING. please help me! and if you could also find one for a 508+ server… would really appreciate it. Trying to make some team pvp stuff and on the teams they have npcs who fight each other. =] would love it!

Read full topic
